Package org.apache.openjpa.event

Interface LifecycleListener

All Superinterfaces:
AttachListener, ClearListener, DeleteListener, DetachListener, DirtyListener, LoadListener, PersistListener, StoreListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLifecycleListener
public interface LifecycleListener extends PersistListener, LoadListener, StoreListener, ClearListener, DeleteListener, DirtyListener, DetachListener, AttachListener
Interface for listening to all LifecycleEvents.
Author:
Steve Kim, Abe White
